title: هل هاسيت على وشك تحقيق حلم ترامب بخفض الفائدة؟
summary: بعد أشهر من المقابلات والتكهنات، يبدو أن البحث عن رئيس جديد للاحتياطي الفيدرالي الأميركي قد وصل إلى محطته النهائية، حيث تبرز ملامح قرار مصيري قد يعيد تشكيل مسار السياسة النقدية الأميركية.

title: Why dark matter is still one of the biggest open problems in science
summary: We can't see dark matter directly, so studying it pushes the boundaries of our creativity as scientists. How exciting, says Chanda Prescod-Weinstein

title: The 13 best popular science books of 2025
summary: Women's hidden extra work, positive tipping points and new thinking on autism – there's much to chew on in this year's best reads, says Liz Else

title: الإمارات وكندا توقعان اتفاقية جديدة لتشجيع الاستثمارات
summary: بحث الشيخ محمد بن زايد آل نهيان رئيس دولة الإمارات، ومارك كارني رئيس وزراء كندا، الخميس، مسار العلاقات الثنائية وفرص توسيع آفاق التعاون في جميع المجالات خاصة الاقتصادية والاستثمارية والتنموية بما يخدم رؤية البلدين نحو التنمية والازدهار المستدام ويعزز مصالحهما المشتركة.

title: Moss spores survive and germinate after 283-day 'space walk'
summary: Astronauts strapped moss spores to the outside of the International Space Station for nine months - and most of them survived the challenging experience

title: Climate heating has reached even deepest parts of the Arctic Ocean
summary: The depths of the Arctic Ocean have warmed more than scientists expected. New research has placed the blame on warmer water from Greenland

title: Brian Eno and Beatie Wolfe discuss their new spacebound album, Liminal
summary: Brian Eno and Beatie Wolfe's album Liminal is being transmitted into space by Nobel laureate Robert Wilson. They give Chelsea Whyte the lowdown

title: Rapid melt from Antarctica could help preserve crucial ocean current
summary: Greenland’s melt is expected to slow the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation, but research suggests a collapse of the West Antarctic ice sheet could in some cases prevent it from shutting down

title: The 19 best Christmas gifts for science lovers (and nerds)
summary: From microscopes to geodes, New Scientist staff share their top Christmas present ideas in a gift guide unlike any you’ve seen before

title: Finally wrangling with the complexity of female bodies benefits us all
summary: Medical research has long sought to gloss over the hormonal and chromosomal complications typical of female biology. But embracing this complexity could benefit everyone

title: Odds of asteroid 2024 YR4 hitting the moon may rise to 30 per cent
summary: In February, the James Webb Space Telescope will briefly be able to observe asteroid 2024 YR4, which currently has a 4 per cent chance of hitting the moon in 2032. Depending on what it sees, the odds of collision could drastically increase
